name: Sunset Groove Pong
description:
Listen to some Jazzy tunes while attempting to keep a pong ball from going past the paddle! A solo game, where the difficulty ramps up as one's score increases.

Recommended to play in Fullscreen! [If it appears to be "lagging" while in fullscreen, it is recommended to swap to a different browser instead.]

Sound Credits:

Background Music: "A Brand New Start" --- TrackTribe from Youtube Audio Library.

Bounce sounds for Ball against Walls/Paddle: "Wind Chimes 3 (Quiet)" --- Giddster from Freesound.
